testcase.name: Create User
testcase.system-out: Given logging in as psych admin user........................................passed When user is on the user creation page......................................passed And user clicks Add student button..........................................passed And user fills in the student details.......................................passed And user clicks Create button...............................................passed Then user should redirected to the student list page........................passed

testcase.name: Edit User
testcase.system-out: Given logging in as psych admin user........................................passed When user is on the user creation page......................................passed And user searches for the student by name...................................passed And user edits the student details..........................................passed Then user should see the updated student details in the list................passed

testcase.name: Delete User
testcase.system-out: Given logging in as psych admin user........................................passed When user is on the user creation page......................................passed And user searches for the student by name...................................passed And user deletes the student................................................passed Then user should not see the student in the list anymore....................passed
